Package controllers

Class TerminalMainLayoutController

java.lang.Object
controllers.TerminalMainLayoutController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientAware, StageAware
public class TerminalMainLayoutController extends Object implements ClientAware, StageAware
Main layout for the physical terminal (kiosk) used by subscribers at the parking lot. The layout includes a top bar and a side menu with quick actions: - Submit vehicle (enter the parking lot) - Retrieve vehicle (collect the car) - Extend parking session - Check availability All other screens are loaded into the center panel.
